interface.toolbarRefresh: Refresh saves list and current save

messages.wrongSavesPath:
Selected saves path is wrong. There are no save files here :(

If you're sure that it's correct maybe you want to save the game first.
messages.saveError: Save failed! File cannot be found or opened for writing.
messages.missingValues:
There are some missing values in this save file, maybe this editor is outdated or something is broken.

Proceed with caution!

Missing values:
messages.refreshConfirm: Looks like you have some unsaved changes, do you really want to refresh?
messages.selectConfirm: Looks like you have some unsaved changes, do you really want to select another save?

help.name: Player name
help.playerLocation: Player location in the game world

help.health: Current health level, good for not dying
help.smvRate: Progression rate of SMV disease per game hour, you can fine-tune it with arrow keys on your keyboard
help.depression: How much you want to hang yourself on a street lamp
help.bowel: How much you need to shit
help.bladder: How much you need to pee
help.alcoholNeed: How much you need that precious Osmo Olut
help.smokingNeed: How much you need to smoke another one
